Reviews.Title: Great tough phone 3 years going
Reviews.Author: Eroc
Reviews.Content: I am extremly rough on phones, i have never had one last more then a year a half, this one has lasted about 3 years now, very tough, i have driven off with it on the roof of my car, and then drove back to find it laying on ground, still worked fine, i have gone into the river to get my dog, still worked great, i dropped more then i can count on all my toes and fingers, still worked, the only breaks i have managed with the phone are the screen, had my keys in the same pocket and leaned against something, and cracked the mini display screen on out side, the other issue was the speaker got quiet just recently.  Although that seems to have corrected itself.  The battery life is still pretty good, i can go about 2-3 days between charges.  i just noticed that the fram connecting the two halfs has a small crack in it, but all function is still there.  The key pad is showing wear but buttons all still work.All in all, it has been a great phone.  Really would like AT&T; to bring the price down a little, especially for current customers, but hey thats what you get with corprations these days.The phone, well worth it, hope the second gen works as well as first.

Reviews.Title: I was tired of making calls with my butt!
Reviews.Author: B. Miller "Rockin' for the Rock!"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because I am pretty hard on phones and am sick of replacing them all the time. Plus, I needed a flip phone because I'm sick of making calls and sending text by accident, and this phone is perfect. The Samsung Rugby is a seriously tough phone, and the flip up feature cuts down on butt calls.It's pretty easy to use, but if you're looking for something that does a million things and will impress your friends, this phone is not the one.It's a great basic phone that does all the important things: phone, text, push to talk, gps, and web. But if you spend half of your life on the phone looking for funny cat videos and keeping up with your fantasy bass fishing team, you should go with something else.I would recommend the Samsung Rugby SGH A837 to anybody that needs a good, rugged, basic cell phone that does a few extra things as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Speaker Phone & Excellent Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Arthur Abott
Reviews.Content: I ordered (2) of these phones for my wife & I. One week after receipt, my wife's phone developed software malfunctions. I contacted Mazell, they immediately sent me an RMA label to return the phone and I received an (expedited)replacement in just a few days with no hassels or complications. Don't worry about ordering from this vendor...Great Customer Service! Thanks Mazell!

Reviews.Title: Sturdy and reliable
Reviews.Author: Thomas J Bruetsch
Reviews.Content: This is a well built phone. I was surprised to discover it was unlocked. It has all the usual AT&T; branding but that's to be expected. You will need to disable the push to talk button. It's very easy to press by accident. That is of course unless you use PTT.

Reviews.Title: exactly what we needed
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: compatible with straight talkheavy duty for menno issuesvery pleased, still cant figure out how to set up internet with the straight talk though on this phone

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: Rhonda Vandeven
Reviews.Content: Great product just what my husband needed.  He is very hard on phones.  This one seems to hold up for him!

Reviews.Title: Great phone .. easy to use, durable.
Reviews.Author: DO'D
Reviews.Content: This phone replaced a MOTOROLA TUNDRA which I kept very shortly. Loved the Rugby (past tense). After many years, I dropped it in the lake. It was a constant companion for kayaking, to give you an idea of the abuse it took .. and kept on ticking.

Reviews.Title: "Amazon Verified Purchase"  Excellent deal!
Reviews.Author: Shea Clarke "~Shea~"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone for my husband who goes through cell phones like tissue as he ends up ruining them at work.This is a great phone, very sturdy, durable and well worth the money.  He has gotten his pocket wet with the phone inside, dropped it off a forklift, had a tool box fall on it, etc...etc...and it is still working perfectly.  I highly recommend this phone to anyone that is rough and has trouble with phones getting damaged often.

Reviews.Title: awesome phone
Reviews.Author: lyron connor
Reviews.Content: I love this phone because it can take a beating. My work demands a phone this reliable let's put it this way my friend was making fun of it I took it slid it oacross the floor to a wall  told him to call my phone still worked asked him to bdo that with his smart phone still waiting

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT PHONE !!
Reviews.Author: Obed Rivera
Reviews.Content: GOOD PHONE DURABLE RUGGED CAN TAKE A LICKING CHEAP BUT EVERY OPTION WORKS IN THE PHONE THE EAR PIECE I RECOOMMEND IS A PLANTRONIS LEGEND WILL WORK FINE WITH THIS PHONE!

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for in a phone.
Reviews.Author: R. Diamond "Diamondback662"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this Refurbed, unlocked and Like New from CELLULAR GALLERY INC. Phone was supposed to be Yellow and Black but I received, much to my pleasent surprise, the black one.I needed an unlocked GSM phone to replace my old tried and true Sanyo Pro 200 that was a CDMA phone on the Platinumtel network. They updated to GSM and sadly I couldn't use the Sanyo anymore.Despite the AT&T; logo that comes up when powered on.. it is indeed unlocked and accepted the Sim card without issue from PTel.I desire in a phone that it be fairly sturdy, a flip style, that it makes decent calls, doesn't require puzzle solving skills to use and has a battery that lasts more than a day or two. This one sounded like it would fit the bill and so far it has.I didn't think I'd find another phone that pleased me as much as the Sanyo did, but this one has been great!Calls are extremely clear.Accessories can be found cheaply. I wish it had come with a plastic belt holster like the sanyo did, but I've found and ordered one that is supposed to go with it.

Reviews.Title: The only phone that can survive my brother and husband
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Draven "KD"
Reviews.Content: I have bought this phone for my husband at least 3 times and my brother has had more than one as well.  Don't read that as you have to replace them often!  My husband and brother are both rough on technology, and this phone has survived where other phones would have tapped out after a week.  The 2 my husband has killed, landed on the hinge that holds the two parts together, that's probably the only weak spot on this phone.  He busted one almost in half, although I have to say, it still worked! I recommend this phone for anyone who is tough on phones.

Reviews.Title: Hubby likes
Reviews.Author: L. Free
Reviews.Content: the volume and clarity is awesome. Durable for hubby to use. He has no problem hearing this overtop of his backhoe running,

Reviews.Title: Nice inxpensive and rugged phone
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: Phone is very reliable and rugged even though it looks very simple and lacks modern features you see in newer phones.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Michael P. Hoeniger
Reviews.Content: I enjoy the flip style phone. I have used this style for sometime now. Great value. Very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: For a lasting phone this is the one
Reviews.Author: Aragon
Reviews.Content: I'm a Millwright and I go through or have gone through a lot of phones. Not this one. It does not have all the bells and whistles as most phones but really that is not what this phone is about and what it is a about is top of the line in its class and price range. The only thing i don't like is at&t; will charge you for using the g.p.s.

Reviews.Title: Rugged enough for my breakable husband
Reviews.Author: Antoinette
Reviews.Content: I love this phone and so does my husband.  I ordered this phone for my husband after going through several other phone in water and other busted scenarios.  This one has been indestructible for him.

Reviews.Title: It is a practical and a durable phone.It is simple to use and the features on the phone are great.
Reviews.Author: Vernon Hobbs
Reviews.Content: It is very durable phone and dependable and a low maintenance phone.It is very simple to use and Samsung done a amazing job in designing this phone.

Reviews.Title: phone worked good for 3 months , now it sucks
Reviews.Author: Dane Beutler
Reviews.Content: sound is terrible , cant hear speaker breaks up . had to order different phone . I cant seem to find a good phone that last .

Reviews.Title: Samsung phone cover
Reviews.Author: Judy Bihm "long time customer"
Reviews.Content: I bought this blue  accessory phone cover to go along with the phone that i purchased and it worked out perfectly.

Reviews.Title: good rugged phone
Reviews.Author: Barry
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a no frills phone that was sturdy and dependable.  It has exceeded those expectations.  I would use the camera as well, but that is about it for this phone, so cannot say much about the other features.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Juan
Reviews.Content: my mother in law enjoy the phone. The keys are practicable for her. good screen and working excellent. thanks. good service

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: JESS R BELL
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a simply rugged phone that will hold up when dropped from a distance, this is the phone for you

Reviews.Title: okay
Reviews.Author: Howard F. Campbell
Reviews.Content: The phone works so far, but the condition of the phone is "good" at best, not "very good" as advertised. The outside and inside is scratched up , and has a strange spot on the outside. There was an insert inside the package asking to not write a bad review, but to contact them first, leaving an email address. Sorry, I don't have time for a bunch of emails, a phone number would have beennice. So take my review as you wish, positive or negative, but it is the truth

Reviews.Title: Great Experience Thus Far
Reviews.Author: Hope
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone for my dad who is in construction. So far it has withstood the beatings of his job and he is very satisfied with its basic functions. He needed a basic but good rugged phone and for the past month he has had no problems so we are hoping this one will last him at least a year or two, if not more. Trustworthy seller as well, as the phone arrived on time & functions perfectly.

Reviews.Title: GREAT for rugged people! :)
Reviews.Author: Crystal E. Edmondson
Reviews.Content: The only problem is that you have to be careful not to press the PTT button, or you could get charges to your bill.Otherwise, this phone is GREAT!! Very rugged and great especially if you work outdoors in all weather conditions, like me.

Reviews.Title: Had trouble with this phone about 2 weeks after getting it...
Reviews.Author: Amy Mueller "amyeliz63"
Reviews.Content: Had trouble with this phone about 2 weeks after getting it. Either could not receive calls or sometime call out. Took it to the ATT store and they gave me a new sim card...that did not help the problem.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Nice!
Reviews.Author: Jodi Henry
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my dad who is in construction work.  He had totally demolished his old phone which was a slider. This looked like a good phone for his line of work and so far he is happy.  The screen is a little small but that's the only issue.  Everything else looks and works great.  It arrived ahead of schedule as described!!  Great deal!

Reviews.Title: Manager
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: It was used but the condition was very poor compared to other used stuff.  Lots of scratches and very dirty.

Reviews.Title: Beat up
Reviews.Author: nathan sutton
Reviews.Content: This phone was in terrible shape. It was like they took it to war and back and let people shoot it with ak"s.

Reviews.Title: POS
Reviews.Author: joshua
Reviews.Content: It wouldnt charge when we got it so they sent a new battery. And that changed nothing still wont charge.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: paparoma
Reviews.Content: Simple flip phone. It is a  great rugged phone with good speakers. Good for text-ing setting alarms.. Long battery life and it is 3g phone so it works with the Microcell device if needed.

Reviews.Title: sucks
Reviews.Author: mustang700
Reviews.Content: do not order from this person or company  did not work it had water damage very very poor shape i had to go buy a brand new one from AT&t; store  very dissapointed in this product i cant even believe that the seller could actually sell this product

Reviews.Title: wrong phone
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: It was listed under SAMSUNG RUGBY 2. I got the phone and it was the 1st edition. I wouldn't have ordered it if I had known that. I could have ordered it off of ebay for 59.99. I am a buisness man myself. I own two buisnesses, I know you don't lie to you customers. Having said that, I would shop somewhere else before buying here again.

Reviews.Title: Mistaken order
Reviews.Author: Ferndale Farms
Reviews.Content: I still swear I clicked on the Rugby II, but computers don't lie huh. I never took it out of it's package to determine if it worked or anything. I returned it.

Reviews.Title: Not The Product's Fault.
Reviews.Author: An Ikearat's Brain "Tom"
Reviews.Content: You may skip this review if you are looking for specifics about the Samsung Rugby cell phone.What I would like to say has to do with the way sellers homogenize language into meaningless junk.It is my opinion that "Condition: Used - Very Good" means wear and tear of use and does not mean the phone is broken or has broken components. I feel that a seller should report broken as separate from "used" allowing a buyer to decide if the broken part(s) can be managed within the expected future use of the product.A "Condition: Used - Very Good" cell phone which is advertized by the manufacturer and Amazon as a "Samsung Rugby SGH A837 Black At&t; Rugged 3g PTT GPS Cell Phone" should retain it's expected function even if "used" included scratches and or dirt. A "rugged" cell phone with a broken henge is no longer "rugged".This phone was purchased through and Sold by: Cell Phone StopWhile this vendor was courteous and amended my order to include an unlocked phone, they did not mention that they would be sending a broken phone. If Cell Phone Stop would like to offer compensation of some sort, I will edit this review to reflect how they addressed the issue. The phone is too inexpensive to go to the trouble of returning it. I will simply purchase another device from another vendor.

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: Zamorash
Reviews.Content: It was a good looking phone but when you talked on it it sounded real quiet on both ends my husband didn't like that because that was why I had bought him this one because he was tired of that on his other phone

ProductInfo.Features:
PTT plus a full range of 3G services
It has music player, GPS navigation, stereo Bluetooth and 1.3 megapixel camera
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Rugby SGH A837 Black At&t Rugged 3g PTT GPS Cell Phone
